author: Simon Difford
description: Run and coffee with zesty lemon. A drink to challenge the Espresso Martini.
name: Livorno Punch (Ponce alla Livornese)
recipeIngredient: 1 Powdered sugar (ground in mortar and pestle)
15 ml Caribbean blended rum aged 6-10 years

recipeInstructions.text: Place thick-cut coin-sized lemon zest in base of glass and cover with sugar
Ideally, use the steam wand of a coffee machine to steam and moisten sugar while also warming glass (alternatively, add a splash of boiling water)
MUDDLE lemon and sugar in base of glass (with small muddler)
TOP with a shot of espresso dispensed straight into your cocktail from the machine
